string-array.name: randremind_release_notes
string-array.item: Added a popup dialog on the first app launch after a feature update to show what changed. It will not show for minor bug fix updates.
Added the option to force the app into English.
Added an indicator to the Help and Feedback page to say if the current build is Beta or Production.
Pulled in some community app translations. Thank you for those who helped.
Added notification dismissed to the reminder log.
Fixed a bug where reordering reminders could crash the app.
